entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
